lessons.japanese: その老婆は三分の利子で金を貸す。
lessons.english: The old woman lends money at the rate of three percent.

lessons.japanese: この貯金には三分の利子が付く。
lessons.english: This deposit bears three percent interest.

lessons.japanese: この貸付金は高い利子をとられることになっている。
lessons.english: This loan will carry very heavy interest.

lessons.japanese: 彼女はそのローンに７％の利子を払った。
lessons.english: She paid seven percent interest on the loan.

lessons.japanese: 貯金通帳に残っていた金で利子がついた。
lessons.english: Interest accrued from the money left in my savings account.

lessons.japanese: 政府はその計画に参加する企業には無利子の融資を行う。
lessons.english: The government will provide interest-free loans to firms that participate in the program.

lessons.japanese: 私は彼女に無利子で５００ドル貸した。
lessons.english: I lent her 500 dollars free of interest.

lessons.japanese: その老婆は三分の利子で金を貸す。
lessons.english: The old woman lends money at the rate of three percent.

lessons.japanese: この貯金には三分の利子が付く。
lessons.english: This deposit bears three percent interest.

lessons.english: This loan will carry very heavy interest.

lessons.english: I lent her 500 dollars free of interest.

lessons.english: The government will provide interest-free loans to firms that participate in the program.

lessons.english: Interest accrued from the money left in my savings account.

lessons.english: She paid seven percent interest on the loan.
